title: Paid for Riot Points but didn't get Riot Points
body: I paid for Riot Points using prepaid credit and I didn't get any Riot Points?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have your points been updated to reflect your purchase as of yet? If not then you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
